function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hiring new staff members during a pandemic without in-person interviews and induction process.","Impact":"Lack of proper onboarding and testing for new staff, leading to potential safety and communication issues.","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual onboarding processes and remote testing where possible. Implement strict safety protocols and communication strategies for new staff.","Technologies":"Video conferencing, virtual reality simulations, remote drug and alcohol testing technologies.","People":"New staff members, existing workforce, project teams.","Owner":"HR departments, project managers, safety officers."}]}
